description: Use of Object.hasOwn instead of Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call - while functionally correct, the original implementation used the more widely compatible pattern. Object.hasOwn requires Node 16.9.0+
fix: Consider using Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(current, key) for broader compatibility, as shown in test implementation
tests_to_add: Existing tests in profile.security.test.ts already cover this - verify Node version requirement documented

description: File contains 0 instances of 'brAInwav' branding in comments, error messages, or logs. While this is a utility script, errors and logs should include branding for consistency
fix: Add brAInwav branding to error/log messages in this script, e.g., log('ERROR', '[brAInwav] ...')
tests_to_add: Add test to verify log output includes brAInwav prefix
